style_property.title: Enable Infinite Scroll
style_property.description: Toggles whether infinite scrolling is enabled for this style.

style_property.title: Featured Ribbon
style_property.description: Definition of the ribbon that will be shown when a product is featured.

style_property.title: Featured Ribbon: Surrounding Border
style_property.description: The border that gives the "wrap around" effect.

style_property.title: Only require click after X pages
style_property.description:
If you want to require click only after a certain amount of pages have loaded, set this here.
0 = Always require click

style_property.title: Require click to load
style_property.description: Controls whether loading the next page happens automatically, or upon pressing a button.

style_property.title: Append to browser history
style_property.description: If selected, new pages loaded will also update the browser's history.

style_property.title: Invoice: Background
style_property.description: The background wrapper for the invoice itself.

style_property.title: Invoice: Header/logo row
style_property.description: The header row contains your logo and sits at the top of the first page of the invoice.

style_property.title: Invoice: Page wrapper
style_property.description: The main page wrapper inside the <body> tag.

style_property.title: List recent releases on license page
style_property.description: Toggles whether the list of recent releases is enabled in the license area for this style.

style_property.title: Product list style
style_property.description: This only affects the category view and the main home page overview.

style_property.title: Product Rating Circle: Bar Color
style_property.description: The color of the rating circle bar.

style_property.title: Product Rating Circle: Bar Width
style_property.description: The width of the bar in the product rating circle

style_property.title: Product Rating Circle: Background Color
style_property.description: The background color for the product rating circle's bar.

style_property.title: Product rating style
style_property.description: Toggles how a product's rating appears in the sidebar on the product information page.

style_property.title: Sale Ribbon
style_property.description: Definition of the ribbon that will be shown when a product is on sale.

style_property.title: Sale Ribbon: Surrounding Border
style_property.description: The border that gives the "wrap around" effect.

style_property.title: Show product owner on overview list
